snippet: AC Milan CEO Adriano Galliani has suggested that some Serie A matches be played abroad to try an showcase the league to an international audience....
lead_paragraph: AC Milan CEO Adriano Galliani has suggested that some Serie A matches be played abroad to try an showcase the league to an international audience.

headline.main: Milan's CEO Suggests Playing Serie A Matches Abroad
headline.print_headline: Milan's CEO Suggests Playing Serie A Matches Abroad
